items.sentence: Three of my friends have gotten married to Canadians.
Tom advised Mary not to buy anything from that store.
Tom advised Mary not to go out after dark by herself.
Tom and Mary ate snails at the restaurant last night.
The police found Tom\'s fingerprints on the doorknob.
It was three weeks before she wrote an answer to Tom.
I haven\'t talked to Tom since he moved to Australia.
I hope that Tom doesn\'t tell Mary about what we did.
I should\'ve told Tom why he was supposed to do that.
I should\'ve warned you that Tom is a little strange.
